titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Donald Kettring (1907-1981) received a Master's in Sacred Music from Union Theological Seminary in 1931 and a B.D. from Union in 1944. He was organist-director at First Congregational Church in Columbus, Ohio, from 1945 to 1948 and organist-director at East Liberty Presbyterian Church, Pittsburgh, from from 1948 to 1972. From 1958, he was also an associate minister at East Liberty Church.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of papers of Donald Kettring, related to his work on the Hymn Selection Committee. The papers date from 1962 to 1974, and include minutes, memoranda, reports, correspondence, expense reports, lists of hymns, sheet music, and lyrics. The correspondence discusses selection of hymns, arrangement, lyrics, and copyright matters. The collection also includes card file indexes of worship book songs, arranged by title and composer.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
